A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi disrespects the characters and the Star Wars universe as a hole with virtually every character either being underdeveloped\, underused or changed completely for the worse. The movie creates a mess leaving countless plot holes and subplots that do not advance the story in any way. It’s as if Rian Johnson wrote this film to purposely hurt the fanbase. I’ve never walked out of a theater feeling this devastated.
